step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them up.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head! This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch for 30 seconds is great. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Returning to the start position smoothly is good. Try to maintain relaxed wrists as you bring your hands back down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Keep focusing on keeping your elbows close to your head and spreading them wide. Remember to hold the stretch and return to the start smoothly.
